name: Spark of Life (sulsadood)
description:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Run into food to eat it.

Plants will spawn randomly and meat and liquid food sources can be obtained from other organisms.

Run into other organisms to damage them(if you have a mouth that can).

If you stand in front of another organism for 5 seconds you will mate with them and take control of the child with the other organisms mouth.
